metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45423 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Buffer Overflow vulnerabilityexists in Pev 0.81 via the pe_exports function from exports.c.. The array offsets_to_Names is dynamically allocated on the stack using exp->NumberOfFunctions as its size. However, the loop uses exp->NumberOfNames to iterate over it and set its components value. Therefore, the loop code assumes that exp->NumberOfFunctions is greater than ordinal at each iteration. This can lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: pev package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
